author: Press
title: Coral Beach Resort Sharjah Enjoys Record Occupancy during Eid Al Adha
text:
(MENAFN Press) Recording the highest occupancy, ADR (Average Daily Rate) and RevPAR (Revenue per Available Room), Coral Beach Resort Sharjah was the best performing hotel in the city this Eid Al Adha. The hugely popular family resort was packed to capacity averaging 100 per cent occupancy on all days of Eid and outperformed the competition in all parameters.

Haytham Aziz, Hotel Manager, Coral Beach Resort Sharjah, said, "We have had a phenomenal Eid with the property yielding the highest average rates and occupancies in Sharjah. I would like to take this opportunity to congratulate our sales and revenue team who have put in a lot of hard-work to deliver these exceptional results. We have always been the most sought-after family destination featuring the finest mix of accommodation, dining and recreation facilities and the recent refurbishment of rooms and various facilities has further enhanced our appeal. Our greatest attraction remains 350 metres of beautiful white, sandy private beach, open daily from sunrise till sunset". 

Talking about the last quarter of 2015, Haytham said, "It is a peak period of demand for us, therefore, we expect to maintain strong occupancies throughout the season. Our aim is to boost every aspect of the business. Bulk of our bookings comes from the leisure segment, however, we are equally keen to grow our corporate business given the extensive events and meeting facilities at the hotel. In addition to our traditional source markets, we are also looking to drive more business from GCC, India and China. We will also explore the potential of countries such as Iran." 

About Coral Beach Resort Sharjah 
The Coral Beach Resort Sharjah recently underwent a complete refurbishment of rooms and facilities that has given it a brand new appeal. The deluxe resort features 156 spacious rooms, many with panoramic sea-view. A major attraction is the wide repertoire of dining options with menus to cater to every taste. The resort is located on one of the emirate's principal sand beaches and features a range of leisure activities for all ages, including the Rimal Club, state-of-the-art fitness centre, children's pool, indoor playroom and complimentary Kid's Club as well as tennis (By Clark Francis Tennis Academy), badminton, volleyball and two outdoor swimming pools.For more information about the hotel, visit hmhhotelgroup.com/coralbeachresortsharjahor https://www.hmhhotelgroup.com/subscribenow
